name: Japan's Best Airline: ANA Business Class, Singapore - Tokyo
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at https://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT for 83% off + THREE EXTRA MONTHS for free!

All Nippon Airways - ANA - is well-regarded as an outstanding airline. But how will they do on a short overnight flight from Singapore to Tokyo? I was lucky to book my ticket during a lull in ticket prices and this is the first part of a looooong 8,000+ mile odyssey to JFK in New York. Subscribe and don't miss the real highlight: ANA's "the Room" business class on the 777-300ER...the world's best? Find out another time!
